text: Ellen Hansen Corby (June 3, 1911 â€” April 14, 1999) was an American actress. Her most famous role was Grandma Esther Walton in the television drama The Waltons. She played that role from 1972 to 1980. She received three Emmy Awards for it. Corby was born in Racine, Wisconsin. She grew up in Philadelphia. She suffered a stroke in November 1976. She died in 1999 in Los Angeles, California. ==Other websites== Category:People from Racine, Wisconsin Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Wisconsin Category:Deaths from stroke Category:1911 births Category:1999 deaths Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors
title: Ellen Corby
